Title: Clarifies that pretrial motions in limine are not required in order for deposition testimony to be introduced at trial
Summary: Clarifies that pretrial motions in limine are not required in order for deposition testimony to be introduced at trial.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to clarifying that pretrial motions in limine are not required in order for deposition testimony to be introduced at trial
